mapper.select: select id,account,password,status,is_app_notice as isAppNotice, is_web_notice as isWebNotice,source_type as sourceType, create_time as createTime,is_enable_app as isEnableApp from qft_user where account = #{account} and is_delete = 0
select count(1) from qft_user where account = #{account} and is_delete = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE qft_user SET is_delete = 1, update_time = #{updateTime}, updater_id = #{updaterId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE qft_user SET password = #{password}, update_time = #{updateTime}, updater_id = #{updaterId} WHERE id = #{id}
